casebody.data:
F. Zacherl, Inc.
v.
Flaherty Mechanical Contractors, LLC, West Allegheny School District, International Fidelity Insurance Company (Two Cases); Petition of West Allegheny School District NOS. 53 WAL 2016
54 WAL (2016) Supreme Court of Pennsylvania August 16, 2016

PETITION FOR ALLOWANCE OF APPEAL

Denied.
